name: osm_load
description: Load OSM data (California) into a local database

scripts.download: npm run download:pbfclean -s  && npm run download:pbfget
scripts.download:pbfclean: if [ -d binaries -a -d binaries/osm ]; then find ./binaries/osm -name california-latest.osm.pbf -mtime +30 -delete; fi
scripts.download:pbfget: npm run download:pbfdir -s && if [ ! -e binaries/osm/california-latest.osm.pbf ]; then curl http://download.geofabrik.de/north-america/us/california-latest.osm.pbf -o binaries/osm/california-latest.osm.pbf; fi
scripts.deploy:schema: SQITCH_DB_URI=${SQITCH_DB_URI:-`sqitch  config --local --get-regexp 'uri' 'pg' | cut -f 2 -d =`} npm install calvad_db_geoextensions && sqitch deploy --to pgsnapshot_schema_linestring

author: James E. Marca
